name: Beautiful Summer
description:
Beautiful Summer is a 2D adventure game in which you need to win the hearts of girls.
You and your girlfriend were going on vacation to a recreation center, but just before the trip she throws you and you have to go alone.Upon arrival at the recreation center, you realize that there are a lot of gorgeous girls in this camp that you can win and have fun.In this game you will need to win the hearts of girls.Chat with them, give gifts and when you spend a great date with them, they will thank you.Everything is in your hands!

Key Features :

- Open World

- Beautiful Soundtrack

- Variety of girls you can get
